author: amaltaro
body:
Created a new CherryPy spec with version 17.4.0 (the latest one supporting python2) and all its python dependencies. Also updated a bunch of other packages.
This PR also contains the matplotlib changes as in #4998 

And I take advantage to also update WMCore tag to 1.2.3.pre3 (and remove an unneeded cherrypy dependency from the wmagent.spec).
title: Update cherrypy to 17.4.0 in a new spec file
